name: Crown Heights Mutual Aid Slack
description: Slack App for Covid volunteer intake

APP_NAME.description: Name of your organization (Crown Heights Mutual Aid)

AIRTABLE_BASE.description: Go to your airtable base. Click on 'Help -> API Documentation' in top right. Scroll to `Authentication`. The thing we need is in 'base('')` to the right.

AIRTABLE_PAYMENTS_BASE.description: If set, should point to the base ID for p2p payments.

AIRTABLE_SYNC.description: If set, run the Airtable sync worker in the main process with this frequency in milliseconds.

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Go to the 'Install App' tab for your app (https://api.slack.com/apps/<your-app-id>/install-on-team). This is 'Bot User Oauth Access Token'

SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Go to the 'Basic Information' tab for your app (https://api.slack.com/apps/<your-app-id>/general). This is 'Signing Secret'

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Go to https://www.twilio.com/console and copy what's under 'AUTH TOKEN'

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Go to https://www.twilio.com/console and copy what's under 'ACCOUNT SID'

TWILIO_VOICEMAIL_URL.description: A url to an mp3 to play when someone calls your Twilio number. Twilio lets you host files here: https://www.twilio.com/console/assets/public

GEONAME_CLIENT_ID.description: Your geoname username. Use if you need /geo API routes (used in the website). It's free to get and use! https://www.geonames.org/login. After creating an account, make sure to enable the API: https://www.geonames.org/enablefreewebservice

GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY.description: Specifically the key for the geocoding service. Free for quite a bit of usage. https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/get-api-key

REACT_APP_MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Mapbox token for client side map. Can be found on https://account.mapbox.com/

BASIC_AUTH_USERS.description: String of username:password separated by semicolons. Used for authed routes (nycma)

MANYC_WEBHOOK_URL.description: URL for sending updates to Manyc. Provided by Mutual Aid NYC.

TWILIO_SMS_DELIVERY_ENDPOINT.description: Twilio endpoint to send SMS for assigning delivery requests via the delivery needed app
